title: Search Engine Optimization: Best Practices
description: Discover essential SEO practices, web tools, and tips for optimizing your site, ensuring crawlability, and enhancing user engagement.

title: Eclipse Attack Detection on a Blockchain Network
description: A non-parametric algorithm detects eclipse attacks in blockchain networks using mean, variance, and smart contracts for a tamper-proof solution.

title: Controlling Transaction Rate in Tangle Ledger
description: This paper presents a Principal-Agent problem framework for to adjusts PoW difficulty based on agents' computing power in Tangle ledger.

title: Favorite Quotes and Recommended Books
description: Discover impactful quotes from books like Man's Search for Meaning and And Every Morning the Way Home Gets Longer and Longer, plus recommended reads.

title: Free Static Website Hosting on GitHub with Custom Domain
description: Host a free static website using GitHub Pages. This guide covers setting up a repository for HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and linking a custom domain.

title: Flyback Converter Project Overview
description: This B.Tech project under Prof. Mukul C. Chandorkar at IIT Bombay focuses on using a flyback converter for pre-charging MMC capacitors and powering Nixie tubes.

title: Data Acquisition System for Epstein Tester
description: This project develops a data acquisition system for the Epstein tester, enhancing it with a built-in module, an AD7768 ADC, and a DE0 Nano FPGA.

title: Measurement of Connectivity in Nanowire Network
description: This project designs an interface between a Keithley SMU and LabVIEW for two- and four-probe measurements of nanowire networks.

title: Special Edition Coins
description: Explore special edition coins that celebrate milestones in Indian history, including the UN's 50th anniversary, the Dandi March's 75th year, etc.

title: Homemade Bread Recipe
description: This guide covers ingredients and equipment for homemade bread, including proofing yeast, making dough, and baking, plus tips for perfect texture.
keywords: baking soda vs baking powder vs yeast

title: Stereovision Using More Than Two Images
description: This project explores a method to extract depth info from multiple image sets, averaging depth maps to enhance accuracy and reduce unresolved pixels.

title: Support Vector Machine (SVM) Using Log-Barrier Method
description: This project explores Support Vector Machines (SVM) for classification, employing the log-barrier method to optimize hyperplane placement.

title: Testing of Digital Circuits Using Beaglebone Black
description: This project develops a Python app for the Beaglebone Black to debug mock circuit designs, using device descriptions and the Postman algorithm with a GUI.

title: Shape Formation Using Kilobots
description: This project uses Kilobots to collaboratively form shapes, guided by Prof. Vachhani and Prof. Sinha, with a finite state machine and orbiting algorithm.

title: Snapshots: Personal Moments in Sketching and Art
description: This section features sketches captured through photography, showcasing a selfie and a Sony headphone from September 16, 2016, blending personal moments.

title: Shared Economy for Battery Storage
description: This project explores shared battery storage to reduce exposure to electricity market fluctuations, highlighting its advantages over individual solutions.

title: Interesting Solutions Based on Good Theories
description: This page features resources on theoretical frameworks, highlighting participatory budgeting, fair allocation algorithms, and animal behavior insights.

title: Pipeline RISC Architecture on FPGA
description: This project designed a 6-stage pipelined processor based on a given architecture, optimizing a 16-bit computer with hazard mitigation techniques.

title: Memorable Moments: A Photo Collection from My Travels
description: Memorable moments: A collection of photographs capturing memorable moments from various locations and experiences.

title: Classification of Image Features for Remote Sensing
description: A study comparing the efficiency of K-mean and C-mean clustering algorithms on satellite images for image feature classification.

title: Hysteresis Loop Modeling in Rolling and Transverse Direction
description: This paper presents a method for modeling dynamic hysteresis loops in grain-oriented magnetic materials using magnetic viscosity and loss separation.

title: Image Stitching for Arbitrary Camera Motion
description: This project stitches multiple images from arbitrary camera motion into a panorama, demonstrated with seven images captured in a hostel room.

title: Generalized Hough Transform
description: This project extends the Hough transform to detect arbitrary, non-parametric shapes with varying scales using gradient information.

title: IITB Fresher's Toolkit
description: A guide for new IIT Bombay students on email personalization, mail forwarding, software installation, and key academic resources.

title: Hobbies: Photography, Sketching, Music, Reading and More
description: A collection of personal hobbies, including photography, sketching, reading, playing musical instruments, and coin collecting.
